Description
Management of package indices.
Keywords

Class 'packageIndex'

Description
Manages a single package index. Entries are the packages encountered during the scan of the directory hierarchy.
Superclasses
indexBase
problemIndex
Methods
public
completeDatabase (author)
packageIndex ()
writeProblemPage ()

Methods

completeDatabase (author)

Propagates author-information to the indexed packages and their contents (files, classes, procedures)
Argument: author Author of the distribution.
Returns: a list containing the names of all packages defined by the scanned distribution.

packageIndex ()

Constructor, parameterizes the baseclass.

writeProblemPage ()

Writes a page containing references to the detailed problem descriptions of packages having such.
